## Viewport.setPosition() method

Sets the \[x,y\] position of the element with the given ID, recalculating bounds.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setPosition(id: string, x: number, y: number): ViewportElement<T["E"]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string |  |
|  x | number |  |
|  y | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ViewportElement](./core.viewportelement)<!-- -->&lt;T\["E"\]&gt;
